definition: a decade of a century (e.g. the Sixties)/age/era/period/CL:個|个[ge4]
in those days/then/in those years/during that time
in those days/then/in those years/during that time

sentences.english: Dr Kraabel began as an editor with the Edanz Group in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 2008年開始爲理文編輯工作，擔任編輯。

sentences.english: Prime Minister Ted Heath takes Britain into the European Community
sentences.chinese: 1973年希思首相把英國帶入歐洲共同體。

sentences.english: Anna was born in 1923 in Ardwick, a suburb of Manchester.
sentences.chinese: 安娜於1923年出生在曼徹斯特的郊區阿德維克。

sentences.english: Anonymous. " Woodruff introduced the six bottle carton in 1923."
sentences.chinese: 伍德拉夫介紹了六瓶紙箱於1923年。

sentences.english: It was the site of a British victory over the Saxons in571. Population, 74, 500.
sentences.chinese: 它是571年大不列顛人打敗撒克遜人的遺址。

sentences.english: He died in 1892, his death being considered as a national calamity.
sentences.chinese: 他死於1892年，他的逝世被認爲是舉國的不幸。

sentences.english: Dr. Stevens has worked at the language institute since 1982.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂文斯從1982年起就一直在語言學院工作。
1759年的今天，英國佔領魁北克城。

sentences.english: The deposit insurance fund fell into the red in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 存款保險資金在2009年進入紅色警戒區。

sentences.english: Xixia Tongguanshan India unearthed in 1983 for the objects.
sentences.chinese: 西夏銅官印1983年出土，爲一級文物。

sentences.english: At least 3 years facility related work experience.
sentences.chinese: 至少3年廠務相關的工作經驗。

sentences.english: Tanggu(Tianjing)is the area of the greatest land subsidence in China nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 天津塘沽區是我國目前年沉降量最大的地區。

sentences.english: Sippy and directed by Ramesh Sippy, released in 1975.
sentences.chinese: 播出，並指示由拉梅什風格，發表於1975年。

sentences.english: In 1608, the partnership also took over the Blackfriars indoor theatre.
sentences.chinese: 1608年，黑衣修士劇院也被他們接管。

sentences.english: IN 1887 physicists were feeling pretty smug about their subject.
sentences.chinese: 1887年物理學家們對自己的學科都頗爲自鳴得意。

sentences.english: Heidi Thmas:150 years after Cranford was written, we're all still here.
sentences.chinese: 克蘭福德寫成後的150年，我們仍在這裏。
